sumarize_req: Cơm Tấm Cali (CTC), a broken rice restaurant chain operating multiple branches in Ho Chi Minh City, intends to develop and deploy a comprehensive system for online ordering and branch management. The system's website component will allow customers to easily browse, select, and place food orders online, with automatic routing to the nearest branch for fulfillment. Key customer-facing features include the display and application of promotions, integrated online payment options (such as Nganluong.vn), a mechanism for customer feedback and restaurant ratings, and accurate, regularly updated pricing to build trust. This online ordering service is specifically aimed at capturing the significant market demand from office workers. For CTC internally, the system will manage all branch operations, providing the necessary data for comprehensive analysis to support strategic business decisions.
